name: SA-AtomicTank
title: SA-T1 Atomic Tank
author: SacredAnarchy
description:
An old rusty tank that fires atomic shells, The SA-T1 Atomic Tank is a powerful but dangerous vehicle that can cause massive damage. Use it with caution! 
The T1-Atom comes with a flamethrower and machine gun along side a twin chamber cannon that accepts the standard shells along with the new T1-Atom Shell.
